sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_attachment ( id char(32) not null, contentid char(32) not null, md5 char(32) not null, topic varchar2(128 char) not null, attachtype varchar2(16 char), attachsize number(20) not null, downloads number(11) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, description varchar2(256 char), primary key(id) );
